channel.title: CVE Feed for crmperks -- Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for crmperks -- Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms

item.title: CVE-2024-2030|2024-03-13T15:27:13.560Z -- crmperks -- database%20for%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%20forms
item.description: The Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
